statements: UPDATE player_preferences SET favorite_color = 'Red', favorite_game = 'Chess' WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE player_preferences SET favorite_game = 'Football', favorite_color = 'Blue' WHERE player_id = 456

UPDATE player_preferences SET favorite_game = 'Chess', favorite_color = 'red', avatar_url = 'image2.png' WHERE player_id = 2

UPDATE PlayerPreferences SET display_name = 'John Doe', favorite_color = 'Blue' WHERE player_id = 123;

UPDATE GameSettings SET sound_effects_volume = 50, graphics_quality = 'High' WHERE player_id = 101;

UPDATE user_preferences SET display_name = 'Alice', email = 'alice@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
